title: 7 Herbs for Natural Remedies Your Grandparents Used
description: 7 herbs to use in your medicine cabinet for common ailments, plus safety tips and precautions. Create a medicine cabinet and preserve the knowledge our great-grandparents had while creating a more natural home.
